studentNameGenerator.title: Random Student Name Generator
studentNameGenerator.description: I created this little project while learning web development at the DCI Digital Career Institute to help my teachers pick a random student whenever they need one (e.g. for answering questions or presenting assignment solutions). Itâ€™s a passion project that I improve whenever I find the time. A relaunch is coming soon, so keep an eye on it!
